alert.note: Alert for Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 30 at 10:30AM CST until December 30 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CST FOR GEORGE...SOUTHEASTERN PERRY AND SOUTHERN GREENE COUNTIES... At 1029 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of McLain to 7 miles west of Lucedale to 7 miles west of Wade to near D`iberville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lucedale and McLain. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
